content: this shark crochet plant cozy is a delightful and whimsical plant accessory that brings a touch of oceanic charm to your indoor greenery it makes for the cutest crochet gift for plant lovers this pattern is part of the 2024 crochet shark week 1 event -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for shark plant cozy crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- 100% cotton worsted weight yarn #4 ------------------------------------- finished measurements ------------------------------------- fits mini terracotta pot 1 25 base 3 25 height ----------------- skill level ----------------- easy ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store - for example staples office depot etc ~ local professional printer ~ online print vendor --------------------- terms of use --------------------- © 2024 sonya blackstone do not sell share or modify this pattern you may sell items you make with this pattern this pattern as with all blackstone designs/sonya blackstone patterns are not for educational use without written permission from the designer online users please link to me when sharing your creations all rights reserved www facebook com/sblackstonedesigns www instagram com/blackstone_designs ------------------------ all sales final ------------------------ due to the nature of digital files they cannot be returned so no exchanges or refunds will be given ------------------------------- ravelry shop coupons ------------------------------- purchase any 3 single patterns & receive 20% off use coupon code save20now purchase any 4 single patterns & receive 25% off use coupon code save25now purchase any 5 single patterns & receive 30% off use coupon code save30now thank you for visiting 1 https //blackstone-designs com/crochet-shark-week-pattern-giveaway/
